moves.name: Ingrain
moves.description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can't switch out.

moves.name: Constrict
moves.description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Sleep Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

moves.name: Vine Whip
moves.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

moves.name: Absorb
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Poison Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target. It may poison the target.

moves.name: Bind
moves.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Growth
moves.description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.description: The user slaps down the target's held item, preventing that item from being used in the battle.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Natural Gift
moves.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

moves.name: Tickle
moves.description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Wring Out
moves.description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater this attack's power.

moves.name: Grassy Terrain
moves.description: The user turns the ground under everyone's feet to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn.

moves.name: Power Whip
moves.description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the target.
